author.bio: Web application security and accessibility evangelist. Software instructor. Conference lecturer and presenter.

wordpressPost.title: Vulnerable WordPress Plugins Report for the Week of March 16, 2018
wordpressPost.excerpt: Vulnerable Plugins Thirteen disclosures since last week, with four issues unfixed. View this week's vulnerable plugins list. As with previous weeks, there are a few fairly popular plugins in this...
wordpressPost.content:
Vulnerable Plugins

Thirteen disclosures since last week, with four issues unfixed.

View this week’s vulnerable plugins list.

As with previous weeks, there are a few fairly popular plugins in this week’s list: Duplicator – WordPress Migration Plugin, WP Job Manager (both have updates available), Limit Login Attempts Reloaded, and Limit Login Attempts (no updates available).  Make sure to get the ones with updates into your change management cycle as soon as possible, and start looking for replacements for the ones that remain unfixed.
